text: Uppalur Railway Station (station code:UPL), is an Indian railway station in Nidamanuru town of Andhra Pradesh. It lies on the Vijayawada-Nidadavolu loop line and is administered under Vijayawada railway division of South Central Railway zone. == Classification == Uppalur railway station is categorized as a Non-Subruban Grade-6 (NSG-6) station in the Vijayawada railway division. == References == Category:Railway stations in Krishna district Category:Railway stations in Vijayawada railway division
title: Uppalur railway station
